name: Advanced Ritual Art
desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon any 1 Ritual Monster. You must also send Normal Monsters from your Deck to the GY whose total Levels equal the Level of that Ritual Monster.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Backup Squad
desc: Each time you take 1000 or more damage by your opponent's card effect or their monster's attack: Draw 1 card for every 1000 damage you took.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Beaver Warrior
desc: What this creature lacks in size it makes up for in defense when battling in the prairie.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Black Illusion Ritual
desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Relinquished". You must also Tribute a monster from your hand or field whose Level is 1 or more.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Black Luster Ritual
desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Black Luster Soldier". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 8 or more.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Black Luster Soldier
desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Black Luster Ritual".
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Celtic Guardian
desc: An elf who learned to wield a sword, he baffles enemies with lightning-swift attacks.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Charging Gaia the Fierce Knight
desc: You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. If this card is Normal Summoned without Tributing, its original ATK becomes 1900. If this card is Tributed: You can add 1 "Black Luster Soldier" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Charging Gaia the Fierce Knight" once per turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Curse of Dragon
desc: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: D.D. Crow
desc: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card to the GY, then target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish that target.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Dark Magician
desc: ''The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.''
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Djinn Disserere of Rituals
desc: When you Ritual Summon a monster, you can banish this card from your GY as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon. The monster Ritual Summoned using this card is unaffected by Trap effects.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Djinn Prognosticator of Rituals
desc: When you Ritual Summon a monster, you can banish this card from your GY as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon. If you Ritual Summon using this card, if that Ritual Summoned monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent, they discard 1 card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Dust Tornado
desc: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Eliminating the League
desc: Discard 1 Spell, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; destroy that target, then look at your opponent's hand and send all cards in their hand with the same name as that destroyed card to the GY.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Fighting Spirit
desc: The equipped monster gains 300 ATK for each monster your opponent controls. If it would be destroyed by battle, you can destroy this card instead.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Fulfillment of the Contract
desc: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 Ritual Monster in your GY; Special Summon it and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, banish the equipped monster.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Gaia the Dragon Champion
desc: "Gaia The Fierce Knight" + "Curse of Dragon"
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Gaia The Fierce Knight
desc: A knight whose horse travels faster than the wind. His battle-charge is a force to be reckoned with.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Giant Soldier of Stone
desc: A giant warrior made of stone. A punch from this creature has earth-shaking results.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Goblin Circus
desc: Once per turn, during your End Phase: Reveal the bottom card of your Deck, then place it on the top of the Deck or banish it face-down.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Illusionist Faceless Mage
desc: Manipulates enemy attacks with the power of illusion.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Illusionist Faceless Magician
desc: If a face-up "Eyes Restrict" Fusion Monster(s) or "Relinquished" you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon this card from the GY (if it was there when that monster was destroyed) or hand (even if not). If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 "Eyes Restrict" Fusion Monster or "Relinquished" in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Illusionist Faceless Magician" once per turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Knight of Legend
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.]

Activate this Skill during your Main Phase. Each turn, 1 "Gaia The Fierce Knight" you Normal Summon can be Summoned without Tributing. Apply the following Skills while you control a "Gaia The Fierce Knight" monster or a "Gaia the Dragon Champion" monster.
● If it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. Once per turn, if it inflicts battle damage with this Skill, draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.
● You cannot activate Set cards in the Spell & Trap Zone.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Kuriboh
desc: During damage calculation, if your opponent's monster attacks (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; you take no battle damage from that battle.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Magic Jammer
desc: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Magician of Faith
desc: FLIP: Target 1 Spell in your GY; add that target to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Manga Ryu-Ran
desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Toon" card.)
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 2 monsters, while you control "Toon World". Cannot attack the turn it is Special Summoned. You must pay 500 LP to declare an attack with this monster. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. Can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon monster, in which case this card must target a Toon monster for its attacks.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Old Vindictive Magician
desc: FLIP: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Polymerization
desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Red Archery Girl
desc: A mermaid archer that hides in a protective shell, waiting for the right moment to strike.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Relinquished
desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Black Illusion Ritual". Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card (max. 1). This card's ATK/DEF become equal to that equipped monster's. If this card would be destroyed by battle, destroy that equipped monster instead. While equipped with that monster, any battle damage you take from battles involving this card inflicts equal effect damage to your opponent.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Ritual of Black Mastery
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.]

Activate this Skill during your Main Phase, while you control "Black Luster Soldier" or "Magician of Black Chaos" that you Ritual Summoned this turn.
● While you control "Black Luster Soldier", it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Skill, also once per turn, if your opponent activates a Trap Card, draw 1 card immediately after it resolves.
● While you control "Magician of Black Chaos", it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Spell effects, also if your "Magician of Black Chaos" destroys a monster by battle, add 1 Spell from your GY to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Security Orb
desc: When your opponent's monster declares an attack: Target that attacking monster; change that target's battle position. If this Set card is destroyed by your opponent's Spell/Trap effect and sent to the GY: Destroy 1 monster on the field.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Senju of the Thousand Hands
desc: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Seven Tools of the Bandit
desc: When a Trap Card is activated: Pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Shadow Specter
desc: Powerful in groups, this animal spirit can be found in the wastelands.

name: Shield Spear
desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 400 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Silver Fang
desc: A snow wolf that's beautiful to the eye, but absolutely vicious in battle.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Skill Successor
desc: Target 1 face-up monster you control; it gains 400 ATK until the end of this turn. During your turn, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up monster you control; that target gains 800 ATK until the end of this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Sonic Bird
desc: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Soul Release
desc: Target up to 5 cards in any GY(s); banish them.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Spell Shattering Arrow
desc: Destroy as many face-up Spells your opponent controls as possible, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each.

name: Spellbinding Circle
desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster your opponent controls; it cannot attack or change its battle position. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Sphere Kuriboh
desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; change the attacking monster to Defense Position. When you Ritual Summon, you can banish this card from your GY as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Spiral Spear Strike
desc: If "Gaia The Fierce Knight", "Swift Gaia the Fierce Knight", or "Gaia the Dragon Champion" you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If "Gaia the Dragon Champion" inflicts battle damage with this effect: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Summoner's Art
desc: Add 1 Level 5 or higher Normal Monster from your Deck to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Thousand-Eyes Idol
desc: A wicked entity that controls the hearts of men, its thousand eyes are able to see and expand the negative influences in an individual's soul.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Thousand-Eyes Restrict
desc:
"Relinquished" + "Thousand-Eyes Idol"
Other monsters on the field cannot change their battle positions or attack. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card (max. 1). This card's ATK/DEF become equal to that equipped monster's. If this card would be destroyed by battle, destroy that equipped monster instead.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Thousand-Eyes Spell
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.]

Activate this Skill during your Main Phase. Once per turn, you can discard 1 card and use 1 of the following Skills, but you cannot conduct your Battle Phase this turn.
● Ritual Summon 1 "Relinquished" from your hand by Tributing a monster from your hand or field whose Level is 1 or more, also flip this card over.
● Fusion Summon 1 "Thousand-Eyes Restrict" from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material, also flip this card over.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Toon Alligator
desc: An alligator monster straight from the cartoons.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Toon Barrel Dragon
desc: Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. While you control "Toon World" and your opponent controls no Toon monsters, this card can attack your opponent directly. Once per turn: You can target 1 card on the field; toss a coin 3 times and destroy it if at least 2 of the results are Heads.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

name: Toon Buster Blader
desc: Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. Gains 500 ATK for each Dragon monster your opponent controls or is in their GY. While you control "Toon World" and your opponent controls no Toon monsters, this card can attack your opponent directly.

name: Toon Dark Magician

If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Toon Mask

name: Toon Masked Sorcerer
desc: Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. While you control "Toon World" and your opponent controls no Toon monsters, this card can attack your opponent directly. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Draw 1 card.

name: Toon Mayhem!
desc:

The first time each "Toon World" in your Spell & Trap Zone would be destroyed each turn, it is not destroyed.

Can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon monster, in which case this card must target a Toon monster for its attacks.

name: Toon Rollback

desc: A dragon commonly found guarding mountain fortresses. Its signature attack is a sweeping dive from out of the blue.
